sentences.sContent: He was in urgent need of medical attention.
The report called for urgent action to reduce lead in petrol.
sentences.sCn: 报告呼吁迅速采取行动，减少汽油中的铅含量。

sentences.sContent: ...It is urgent for governments to increase the cost of using fossil fuels to an appropriate level to lessen 	the catastrophic effects of climate change...
...we are in urgent need of an education system that stresses innovation over mechanical learning...
...there is urgent desire to boost the economy as quickly as possible...
...humans have learned to pay attention to the most urgent issues instead of long-term concerns...
...and an urgent need for dramatic improvements in training programs to help close the gap...
...for the obvious reason that caring for children is not only morally urgent but essential for the future of society...
